reviews.text: Drank it today was fabulous made my day the best in Iraq possibly the Middle East. It was very fresh.

This was the first IPA I ever tried. I tended to shy away from them, because I was told IPAs would destroy my palate for other beers. It kinda did, but with beers like this, Iâm really not complaining.
I may have inflated numbers a bit for nostalgia. This was one of the best "everyday" beers while living in Iraq. Slightly floral and spiced, but not overwhelming. Kinda hard to find here in UAE.
